thread.title: Best Country in World? Survey Says Switzerland...
thread.title_full: Best Country in World? Survey Says Switzerland...

title: Best Country in World? Survey Says Switzerland...
text: Countries U.S. News in partnership with Y&R's BAV and Wharton Best Countries is a rankings, news and analysis project created to capture how countries are perceived on a global scale. The rankings evaluate 80 countries across 24 rankings drawn from a survey of more than 21,000 global citizens, measuring 75 dimensions that have the potential to drive trade, travel and investment and directly affect national economies.
